en.pressContinue: Press the next button to continue.
en.opening_0: Hello there, welcome to the Garden Family! Here, we will to breed animals and grow some plants.
en.opening_1: It's really hard for me to do this all alone, so I will need your help!
en.opening_2: Here's some animals and plants to take care on the garden.
en.firstdeer_0: What you need to do is just to give them what they need. Easy, right?
en.firstdeer_1: All the items that you needed is prepared on the box below
en.firstdeer_2: The animals and the plant will show what they needs
en.firstdeer_3: Just drag the item on the box below to them
en.firstdeernext_0: But don't work slow, or else the animals will run, or worse -- the plants will die!
en.firstdeer_3: Just drag the appropriate cards to the animal/plants when they need something.
en.firstdeernext_1: Put the trash cards and unneeded cards into the red recycle bin to make spaces for new cards!
Sometimes you will get trash cards and unneeded cards, just put it into the red recycle bin to make spaces for new cards!
en.firstgrow_1: Just like the other animals, goats will grow if they lived long enough while consuming sufficient foods.
en.firstgrow_2: It's thanks to you for giving them what they need. Keep up the good work!
en.firstdeergrowdifferentstructure_0: At some point, animal will grow while having some changes in their body structure.
en.firstdeergrowdifferentstructure_1: Just as you can see in this goat, it has undergo several different feature changes.
en.firstdeergrowdifferentstructure_2: I'm very curious to see how far animals can grow!
en.firstplant_0: Hey, I bought a new plant! You'll have to take care of it differently from animals, though.
en.firstplant_1: Just like the other living organism, it will also grow after they lived long enough.
en.firstplant_2: Take a good care of it and we'll see how it'll grow soon!
en.firstduck_0: Look at these little ducks. Aren't they cute?
en.firstduck_1: Fun fact: they grow differently from goats! Ducks came from an egg, while goat was born directly from its mother.
en.firstduck_2: Let's take care of them and see how they grow later!
en.firstplantgrow_0: Do you want to know more about plants?
en.firstplantgrow_1: Plants grow differently from animals. Do you know what are the differences?
en.firstplantgrow_2: First of all, it started as a seed,
en.firstplantgrow_3: After it got enough mineral from soil and water, they will become a sprout.
en.firstplantgrow_4: After they lived long enough, they will grow bigger! Each plants grow differently, but usually they will have root, stem, leaves and sometimes fruit after they've grown big.
en.deergrowfinalstructure_0: It's reaching its adult state. Look at how brave it is!
en.deergrowfinalstructure_1: Beside different looks, it has also grown in the inside. Look at the growth of its bone.
en.deergrowfinalstructure_2: It is larger than before; that's why some of their body parts are getting larger, too.
en.deergrowfinalstructure_3: Great job so far. Let's find out more about animal growths!
en.finalgame_0: Finally, that's it! It has been very fun taking care all of this together with you.
en.finalgame_1: But now it's time to say goodbye.
en.finalgame_2: I hope you learned a lot while playing this game with me. You did a great job!
en.finalgame_3: Thanks for helping me out, and let's play again sometimes!
